name.value: FHIR Connectathon 15 - Provider Directory - Scenario 2 - PractitionerRole Locate Direct Address - XML

description.value: PractitionerRole search capabilities tests; resource format XML; validate telecom and physical location; Endpoint resource to be returned via _include; test a FHIR server's PractitionerRole search operation support using the parameters: practitioner.name. Default values for the search parameters are based on the Practitioner Resource Example and can be modified to allow testing against other known PractitionerRole resource instances.
PractitionerRole read and search operations
Search PractitionerRole using the practitioner.name search parameter with the provided name.family data value.
Search for PractitionerRole matches using the practitioner.name search. The name value used is the family portion of the name.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the returned format is XML.
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.

Confirm that there are at least two records returned - a PractitionerRole and included Endpoint. Although not expected, there could be other PractitionerRole and Endpoint records returned. Warning only to allow for Endpoint to be contained in the PractitionerRole.
Confirm that the Bundle total value matches or is greater than the number of entries in the Bundle.

Confirm that there are PractitionerRole and included Endpoint returned resources. Although not expected, there could be other PractitionerRole and Endpoint records returned. Warning only to allow for Endpoint to be contained in the PractitionerRole.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.select(resource as PractitionerRole).exists() and Bundle.entry.select(resource as Endpoint).exists()
